resources.string: To add your location to a moment we need your permission to access it
To add your location to a moment we need your permission to access it.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To record audio posts we need permission to access the microphone
To record audio posts we need permission to access the microphone.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To record audio we need permission to access the microphone
To record audio we need permission to access the microphone.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To take photos and record videos we need permission to access the camera and record audio on your device
To take photos and record videos we need permission to access the camera and record audio on your device.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To connect with your friends and family we need permission to access contacts on your device
To connect with your friends and family we need permission to access contacts on your device.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To pick media we need permission to access your device storage
To pick media we need permission to access your device storage.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
To use voice calls we need permission to access the microphone
To use video calls we need permission to access the microphone and camera
To use voice calls we need permission to access the microphone.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.

HalloApp is here! And we\'re building it for you and your loved ones. We\'ve brought social apps back to basics, while adding a layer of security and privacy that we think everyone in the world should have access to. HalloApp will never use your personal information or show you ads. Instead, we plan to eventually offer additional features at a small cost.
Thank you for using and sharing HalloApp with your friends and family. We\'re improving it every week.
If you have any questions or feedback email us at android-support@halloapp.com
To save the media to the gallery we need permission to access your device storage
To save the media to the gallery we need permission to access your device storage.\n\nOpen the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
In order to connect you with your friends and family we’ll need your permission to access your contacts to sync the phone numbers in your address book.
HalloApp never messages anyone on your behalf, and only uses your phone contacts to connect you with friends & family.
"HalloApp" would like to access your contacts
This post is no longer available
This post could have expired, been deleted, or something else.
Allow HalloApp access to your contacts so you can send and receive updates
Allow HalloApp access to your contacts so you can send and receive updates. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Contacts on
